Text:
I will try to seed as much as possible, but I can only UL about 60 kb/sec, and right now there is about 10 peers or so.
I can seed about 10 hours a day or so, and the total album is 139 MB, so it will take a while.
But please hang on and seed yourself when you have completed the download.
Good night everyone

Fantastic. Thanks for the upload, this music listens easy ^_^. 
Do you have any idea in what year this was released? Discogs.com doesn't list this album...
Sorry, should've read better. It wasn't released at all.

I'd heard rumors of its existence after the release of Gulag Orkestrar, and alas, here it is!  Thank you so much.  

I have a copy of their "Black Session" from French Radio last November I'll try and get up as well.
Ok, I fucked up in naming the French Radio bootleg torrent, forgot to put "Beirut" in the thing.  Here is is though.  http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4201694/Bootleg_11_24_07.zip
Do you know what year this was recorded?
This album was recorded in 2001, Zach Condon was using the band name "The Real People" when this was produced.
Thanks a lot mate! GREAT STUFF!
